trans-unit.source: Manages serialization plug-ins created, using <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" />, by manufacturers who have their own proprietary serialization formats.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.ISerializerFactory" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> 管理序列化外掛程式，此外掛程式由擁有其自己的專有序列化格式的製造商所建立。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can create a <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>.
trans-unit.target: 只有完全受信任的呼叫端可以建立<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>。

trans-unit.source: The following examples show use of the <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider>建構函式。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> that contains serialization information for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" />，包含 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> 的序列化資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> to which the returned object writes.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的物件要寫入至其中的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an object derived from the abstract <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> class for the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> that will use the specified descriptor.
trans-unit.target: 初始化從指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> (將使用指定的描述項) 的抽象 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 類別衍生的物件。

trans-unit.source: An object of a class derived from <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" />.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerWriter" /> 之類別的物件。

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted applications can call <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 只有完全受信任的應用程式可以呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows using <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A> to return a plug-in serialization writer for saving a file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.CreateSerializerWriter%2A>返回外掛程式序列化寫入器以儲存檔案。

trans-unit.source: One of the parameters is null.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個參數為 null。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="serializerDescriptor" /> is specifying the wrong version.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serializerDescriptor" /> 指定的版本錯誤。

trans-unit.source: -or-
It is not registered.
trans-unit.target: 其未註冊。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The assembly file cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 找不到指定的組件檔案。

trans-unit.source: -or-
The assembly cannot be loaded.
trans-unit.target: 無法載入組件。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of the installed plug-in serializers.
trans-unit.target: 取得已安裝之外掛程式序列化程式的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> objects already registered.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊 <see cref="T:System.Collections.ObjectModel.ReadOnlyCollection`1" /> 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" />。

trans-unit.source: The following examples show using <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.InstalledSerializers%2A> to enumerate the plug-in serializers when saving a file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例顯示使用<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerProvider.InstalledSerializers%2A>儲存檔案時，列舉之外掛程式序列化程式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> for the plug-in.
trans-unit.target: 外掛程式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to overwrite an existing registration for the same plug-in; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 以覆寫相同外掛程式的現有註冊，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Registers a serializer plug-in.
trans-unit.target: 註冊序列化程式外掛程式。

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can use this method.
trans-unit.target: 只有完全受信任的呼叫端可以使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The method will interpret an already registered plug-in as the same one if it is the same in all these properties: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 方法會解譯為已經註冊為同一個如果它是相同的所有這些屬性的外掛程式： <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serializerDescriptor" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serializerDescriptor" /> 為 null。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="overwrite" /> is <see langword="false" /> and the plug-in is already registered.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="overwrite" /> 為 <see langword="false" />，且已經註冊外掛程式。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" /> for the plug-in.
trans-unit.target: 外掛程式的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor" />。

trans-unit.source: Deletes a serializer plug-in from the registry.
trans-unit.target: 從登錄中刪除序列化程式外掛程式。

trans-unit.source: Only fully trusted callers can use this method.
trans-unit.target: 只有完全受信任的呼叫端可以使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The method will interpret a registered plug-in as the same one passed to this method only if it is the same in all these properties: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法將解譯註冊外掛程式視為相同的其中一個傳遞給這個方法只有在相同的所有這些屬性： <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.DisplayName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyName%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.AssemblyVersion%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Documents.Serialization.SerializerDescriptor.WinFXVersion%2A>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="serializerDescriptor" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="serializerDescriptor" /> 為 null。

trans-unit.source: The plug-in is not registered.
trans-unit.target: 此外掛程式未註冊。

trans-unit.source: See **Remarks**.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱**備註**。
